article:
A.French billionaire used to have a rough time when he was young. Later he   _   himself in the field of drawing sales. Within ten years, he had   _    a young media tycoon  in France. He died of cancer in 1998.
A French newspaper published his   _    after his death, in which he claimed: "I was a poor guy. Before I reach the threshold  of heaven, I leave my secret of how to become  _   to the world. Anyone who can answer the question 'What do the poor   _    most?' will have discovered my   _   of  becoming rich. He will have my   _   . My deposit  of one million francs in the private safe of my bank will be the prize for his   _    in uncovering the riddle  of   _    ."Many people  _   to the publicized will. The answers, as one might imagine, were   _  . The majority of them thought the poor were missing money most. Some stated that what the poor most    _  was opportunity. Still others thought that the poor needed skills to make money. The rest of the answers claimed that poverty could be attributed to the    _    of help, love, attractiveness, name-brand clothes, and   _  who is in government.
On the first anniversary of the billionaire's passing, his lawyer and representatives   _   his private safe in the bank; the secret of getting rich was   _  . The billionaire believed that the most absent among the poor was the  _  of getting rich.
It was a nine-year-old girl who  _   the nail on the head. Why did she regard "ambition " as the thing the poor lacked most? The day she was officially   _   the one million francs, she said: "Every time my elder sister brought her boyfriend home, she always   _  me not to be ambitious. So, I thought perhaps ambition was something that brought what you wanted."
